TextView.android:text: \t\tNote: These are short descriptions of rituals commonly known in-game. Additional rituals exist but you must discover them in game. Many rituals have additional powers beyond those listed in summary!
A ritual circle that only resurrects those who are invested.
You may speak once during death count (RP only).
Converts Leech to Greater Leech spells which drain more body.
Grants the ability to see and speak to ghosts and spirits.
Enchants weapon to cause infliction damage, 2/ever.
Taints an area with corruption (RP only).
Locks control of a lesser undead to it’s current master.
Increases duration of necromancy rituals by +3 months.
Creates an item with 5 level 1-5 battle magic spells.
Allows the possession of an undead while your body remains at another location.
Transfer control of undead to another person.
Power word that controls all undead within earshot.
Allows an undead to reform when destroyed.
Suspends death counts within the circle during necromancy rituals.
Increases body, ability usage and strength of undead.
Raises a deadly undead to attack a specific target.
Adds the ritual prefix to one battle magic spell.
Teleports user to a pre-determined and prepared graveyard.
A weapon whose duration gets extended if used to killing blow.
Adds 1 year to the duration of Dark rituals.
Primary caster of a circle can control additional undead.
A pit or crypt that raises ghouls and spectres daily.
Enchants a weapon to heal the user via damage done.
A weapon that raises skeletons from those it kills.
Turns 1/ever Necromancy ritual effects into 1/day effects.
Investees can now cast death magic and control lesser undead.
Advanced ritual reflect vs healing that also converts to infliction.
You become a wraith upon death and can resurrect if you return to your circle.
Converts you into a wraith or ghost upon final death.
PWA: 15 infliction pulse every 1 minute around you for an hour.
Begin a quest to become a lich.
Raises the target as a lich if they’ve completed their quest.
Power Word Area: Control Lesser Undead
